p:
The antioxidant half-maximal inhibitory concentration (IC 50) for T. leucocladum extract and Trolox and their standard deviations were calculated by using BioData Fit edition 1.02 (data fit for biologist) [ 19]. The antioxidant activity of T. leucocladum at the different concentrations mentioned above was expressed in terms of the antioxidant activity of the Trolox standard. This was determined by using the following equation:
